column5: the Bureau of Immigration and Customs Enforcement of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police Office received one foreigner
column8: from the police force of Chroy Changva administration.------The man had been causing a nuisance and blocking traffic in Chroy Changva
column9: upsetting public order.------He came to the Kingdom of Cambodia on 14.08-2018 via Phnom Penh International Airport.------He was taken to the  Department of Immigration Investigation and Implementation  to carry out legal procedures.------ SOURCE
